name: Swordsmyth
description:
When you are a terrible swordsman, and every choice can alter your conversational combat... how will you resolve conflict?

Built upon the intention of combining a choose-your-own-adventure game with a beat-em up, Swordsmyth is an unconventional, samurai-inspired, revenge story that includes sentient swords and yokai warriors.

Dreams of growing up to be an actual visual novel!

[Cover art by Elisa Moriconi & Anand Ramcheron]
